data.text: @PatGrove2 @JeremyVineOn5 What did you do pre covid? If you really were not well you would call in sick! Protect yourself and others. But I do agree that sufficient payment should be made to those who are not well to stay at home that but I agree with.

@GrizzBoy4 @JeremyVineOn5 Right next time you have an operation you'll be happy to have it done without the doctors wearing masks! Don't be so obtuse and if you please, don't swear there is no need for that kind of language!
@JeremyVineOn5 41 deaths in Scotland  yesterday  110 deaths last week.
@JeremyVineOn5 They are going up in Scotland  as well and we still wear masks.
@s0f0nisba @JeremyVineOn5 Yep. I have had to cut back on work. I really hope I get back to full strength. Rising bills y'know...
@Dan1elwhittaker @JeremyVineOn5 How do you stay at home if the government has stopped payments? Or if your boss says you have to come in? This get on with it attitude is causing huge issues.
@JeremyVineOn5 Definitely. It's not over ..wait until it becomes worse!
